section.name: Mailing Lists
section.p: If you have suggestions, please send them to fissures-dev@iris.washington.edu. This is a majordomo email list that you should subscribe to. Send an email to majordomo@iris.washington.edu with

Please remember that if you send an email to fissures-dev, it goes to everyone on the list. So if you are trying to subscribe or unsubscribe you should send the email to
majordomo@iris.washington.edu instead. I have also put the past emails here.
